column2: "Na woyinom nye Ehud n’asefo: wɔyɛ Geba atsefo mu egyanom efiefi do etsitsir
column3: na wɔfaa hɔn ndɔmmum kɔr Manahat:"

column4: na Gera; ɔnoara na ɔfaa hɔn ndɔmmum kɔree; na ɔwoo Uza na Ahihud."

column2: "Na Saharaim woo mba wɔ Moab haban mu
column3: ber a oegya Husim na Baara a wɔyɛ ne yernom no kwan no n’ekyir no."

column2: "Na ɔnye ne yer Hodes woo Jobab

column4: na Mirma. Woyinom nye ne mba

column2: "Na ɔnye Husim woo Abitub na Elpaal."

column4: na Semed a ɔkyekyeer Ono na Lod

column3: na Sema a wɔyɛ Aijalon atsefo mu egyanom efiefi do etsitsir a wɔpaam Gat atsefo no;"

column4: na Joha; woyinom yɛ Beria asefo;"

column2: "Woyinom nye egyanom efiefi do etsitsir hɔn ebusuasantsen nyina mu

column3: Jeiel a ne yer dzin dze Maaka tsenae:"

column2: "Na Miklot woo Simea. Na hɔn so wɔnye hɔn nuanom tsenaa Jerusalɛm
column3: wɔ hɔn nuanom no hɔn tsentsendo."

column2: "Na Ner woo Kish; na Kish woo Saul; na Saul woo Jonatan
"Na Jonatan ne ba nye Merib-baal; na Merib-baal woo Mika."
"Na Ahaz woo Jehoada; na Jehoada woo Alemet
column4: na Zimri; na Zimri woo Moza:"

column2: "na Moza woo Binea; n’asefo nye Rafa

column8: na Hanan. Woyinom nyinara wɔyɛ Azel n’asefo."

column2: "Na no nua Esek ne nye mba; n’abakan Ulam
"Na Ulam ne mba no wɔyɛ mbarimba akatakyi a wɔyɛ ndam
column6: ɔha eduonum. Woyinom nyinara yɛ Benjamin n’asefo."
